item.title: Sherrod Brown bio
item.description: Senator Sherrod Brown Biograph Senator Sherrod Campbell Brown is an American educator and politician. He has been serving as a senior US Senator from Ohio under the Democrats since 2007. He was a member of the US House of Representatives from 1993 to 2007. He represented Ohioâ€™s 13th District. He also served as a member of the Ohio House of Representatives. Brown was born in Mansfield, Ohio, on November 9, 1952.
